name: Battle Squad
description:
It’s the latest chapter of the Demong Hunter series!
Simple and Easy playable action fantasy.
Collect and train various heroes from the Demong Hunter series to create your own formidable combat team!

★ Various Challenge Modes ★
Test your skills against other Hunter Teams in the Training Grounds.
Stop the Goblin King from escaping with the stolen gold.
Put an end to powerful monsters trying to break through the Hell Gate.
Experience a vast array of challenge modes.

★ Journey to Seek Out Queen Mago ★
The peaceful Nas Kingdom of the Cyber World.
Queen Mago has gone missing! Where in the world did she disappeared off to?!
All the while, Bug Monsters, or Demong, run loose all throughout the kingdom forcing the Hunters to team together to effectively take the enemy on.

★ Supported Languages ★
English, Japanese, Korean, Spanish, Portuguese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese

Ads and in-app products are sold during gameplay.
If you have any questions regarding the game, please e-mail us or write us on the community board. We will respond ASAP!
Warning: Game deletion also means the deletion of your game data, which cannot be recovered once deleted.

This game requires that following access at installation.
Save / Phone - Used for saving and confirming the player information.
Address Book - Used for the user’s selective ad viewing.
